CODENAME.id: the order in which items should be shown
CODENAME.page: page to show this item on
CODENAME.title: title to show
CODENAME.price: the currency price of this item
CODENAME.summary: a short summary of what this item does/is

statistics.key: name of settingsGateway key to modify

CODENAME.titleInValue: whether to show the title in the field value or not (default = true)
CODENAME.affectSales: whether this item should be affected by sales or not (default = true)

safe.title: **The Safe**
safe.summary: All those bitches tryna rob ya?
